result.execSummary:
The defendant Charles (nmi) Littlebear was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Charles (nmi) Littlebear

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Charles (nmi) Littlebear in court with attorney Puck Tsai.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Tsai states matter is resolved.  State states recs.  Atty Tsai agrees and NC plea entered to Ct 3.  DE agrees.  Court questions DE on plea/accepts/finds guilty.  Atty Tsai makes statement.  Court admonishes DE and sentences.

Ct 1:  Dismissed/read-in
Ct 2:  Dismissed/read-in
Ct 3:  NC
Fine/costs of $443.00 to be paid today or set up payment plan w/Clerk of Court's Office
DNA sample to be provided
Return date on April 6, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Charles (nmi) Littlebear in court with attorney Puck Tsai.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DE did provide phone # that was incorrect.  DE has been in contact w/atty. now.  Court will quash warrant.  Requests short adjournment.  Return date scheduled for April 6, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
Return date on March 18, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Attorney Puck Tsai in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant received notice while in custody.  Attorney Tsai request stay of warrant.  State request warrant.  Defendant resides locally.  Request one week stay.    Based on non-appearance, court authorized warrant  Return date scheduled for March 18, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
Return of officer BPD Daniel Delmore; Search Warrant; Affidavit of Warrant; Transcription of phone call

Pre-trial conference at 02-26-2016 09:45 am.
Return date at 03-08-2016 01:00 pm.

Defendant Charles (nmi) Littlebear appeared by video means from LEC w/atty. Puck Tsai. Prosecuting Atty Sue Mueller appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives reading of complaint.  State requests $1000.00 Cash bond.  Atty. Tsai makes bail argument for PA bond.  Advised rights to an attorney.  Requests Preliminary hearing; Time limits waived.  $500.00 CASH bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows: Absolute Sobriety from drugs & alcohol  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 26, 2016 at 09:45 am.  Return date scheduled for March 8, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
